attributes.action: Decrease fuel duty on petrol forcourts and commercial vehiecles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of fuel duty has been steadily rising for the last 10 years, and now it is simply rediculous. why should people who have to travel to do their jobs effectivly earn less money for traveling. People should not be penalised for driving, our country only creates less than one percent of the worlds pollution, therefore hte only reason that there could be is financial. furthermore, if people don't spend money on petrol, they can use it to buy things that they want and need thus increases the recovery of the economy, and putting money back into peoples' pockets
